posts.post_content: Actually looks pretty viable in limited. Yes, yes: a 2/2 flier for 3 is better. But this \*is\* red we are talking about. And yes, the card itself is VERY bad and VERY weak. Just trying to see the bright side of things.

posts.post_content:
0,5/5 works for me.  
Worse than a simple [Storm Crow](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Storm Crow) or [Wind Drake](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Wind Drake).  
It even has a double-red mana cost yet still needs one further mana each turn to get him as big as the latter mentioned Drake, yet this effect can't even be used as regular Fire Breathing since you can activate it only exactly once just for doing this.

posts.post_content:
Red gets a worse [Azimaet Drake](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Azimaet Drake)/[Drake Hatchling](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Drake Hatchling).  
Besides [Granite Gargoyle](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Granite Gargoyle), this is also strictly worse than [Chandra's Firebrand](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Chandra's Firebrand).   
Red's cheap flyers are few and far between, or we'd have a 3-mana 1-power [Furnace Whelp](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Furnace Whelp) by now.
